Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
That being said, as a piece of film from 1950 it's still quite beautiful,, especially because of Love and Art Brother. I think everyone should give this movie a shot at least once if they haven't done it yet.
